column1: # vhostname : a fully qualified domain as wwwroot for the instance
# vtemplate : a Vmoodle template name (stored from a vmoodle snapshot) or empty if no template
# vdatapath : absolute path to moodledata for this instance

column3: or NEW for an autonomous new subnet

column1: # services : Service model to install : one of 'subnetwork'
# forcedns : can override instance deployment if vhostname is not DNS handled. But Mnet initialisation will not be possible.
